units

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • units.Unit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlphaProtectorAI, CarrierAI, Doctor, Engineer, Hole, Ranger, Sniper, Soldier, SpitterAI, ZombieAI, ZombieDogAI

    public abstract class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The abstract Unit class. Used in creating new units and keeping track of each of the units stats.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Unit

        public Unit(java.lang.String unitType,
            Item item,
            int attack,
            int defense,
            int health,
            int movement,
            int range,
            double difficulty)
        Instantiates a new unit. These are the game pieces that will be placed on the map.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the unit type
        item - the given item
        attack - the attack power
        defense - the defense power
        health - the health amount
        movement - the amount of movement
        range - the range
        difficulty - the difficulty
